cmput301f13t10.view

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • cmput301f13t10.view.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    The main menu of the app. Navigates to the library views, the help view and the settings view.
    Author:
    Braeden Soetaert
